entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023
